ctx: intros H m n Hle Hdenote.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma MD : Model kMD : KripkeModel MD M : Kmodel R : Relation (Kworlds M) SM : Semantics L MD cP : context -> Prop rel : bijection (Kworlds M) {x : context | cP x} H_R : forall (m n : Kworlds M) (Phi Psi : {x : context | cP x}), rel m Phi -> rel n Psi -> m <= n <-> Included expr (proj1_sig Phi) (proj1_sig Psi) x : expr m : Kworlds M H : forall Phi : {x : context | cP x}, rel m Phi -> KRIPKE: M, m |= x <-> proj1_sig Phi x n : Kworlds M Hle : m <= n Hdenote : denotation x (KRIPKE: M, m) The term "n" has type "Kworlds M" while it is expected to have type "{x : context | cP x}".

ctx: intros H m n Hle Hdenote.
intros H m n Hle Hdenote.
intros H m n Hle Hdenote.
intros H m n Hle Hdenote.
exceptions.exn: The reference H_R was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros H m n Hle Hdenote.
exceptions.exn: Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros H m n Hle Hdenote. unfold Kdenotation in *. specialize (H m). specialize (H n). intros Phi Hrel Phi' Hrel'. split. -- intros Hsat. apply H_R in Hle; eauto. rewrite H; eauto. -- intros Hincl. apply sat_mono with n; auto. rewrite H in Hincl; eauto.
